name: Psoda
overview:
Psoda is a leader in the field of Portfolio, Programme and Project Management software.

Psoda world class solutions that are robust and completely secure. Psoda is a trusted solution provider, with a proven track record of adding value to organisations of all sizes. Leaders in the space since the dawn of Cloud computing, customers can be confident of robust and secure solutions. Psoda is more than software. Customers can expect excellence in support services and a team that truly goes the extra mile.

Psoda is an organisation on the move. Psoda have a diverse customer base who are from all corners of the globe, including New Zealand, Australia, the USA, Canada and the UK. Examples of NZ based customers include:

  • New Zealand Transport Agency
  • Auckland Transport
  • Meridian Energy
  • Transpower
  • TrustPower
  • Foodstuffs (Wellington)
  • Hutt Valley District Health Board
